评论详情: This bag is very cute and stylish. Thankfully all of the pieces were there as it was obviously used. I ordered a brand new item so I’m not sure why I got a used one.

I've had this purse for a couple of years now and I love it! It's still in great condition, no rips or tears at all. As a mom to small children, I wanted a purse with lots of storage capacity and this definitely has that. The material feels nice, inside and out. It's comfortable to wear on my shoulders and I love that you can wear as a backpack or like a typical should purse. I highly, highly recommend this purse! It's been my favorite one that I have ever owned thus far.

I purchased two other black backpacks and had to return them, because the stitching was loose on one and the other felt like plastic material. This backpack has excellent craftsmanship. For a non-brand name product it is very well made, sturdy, fashionable, good zippers, sturdy straps and several compartments. I give this Shrrie backpack purse five stars.
Bag is well made and light , has a beautiful extra strap, holds two laptops and chargers with plenty of space for other items.

Got the beige / brown two-tone. It's beautiful. Just don't care for the lack of structure overall. Because it collapses due to its soft and flexible material, you need one hand to keep it open while your other hand is retrieving or inserting an item. In addition, the two inner pockets splay open when trying to insert my wallet or water bottle causing them to get caught up in the pocket.  Annoying. I will plan to sew the pockets shut to prevent this hindrance.

The color is exactly as shown, the quality is surprisingly good. I have to say, I was worried at first. It came rolled up in a garment bag like a big ole' hotdog. Sturdy, no loose threads, and the stitching is secure. It looks great and all of the pieces are there. The zippers and zipper pulls are heavy and strong, which is always a toss up when ordering things. Overall this bag is a great quality and I love it. Works well for organizing small items and carry books/computers.
The color and quality are perfect. Can’t wait to get another one in a different color. The wallet is a great plus. All the pockets are easily accessible and made great. Durable and made to last.

评论详情: Love that it unzips down the side. I can see really easy inside and can grab it from many straps.

I bought this just shy of two years ago. I am not happy. I was not expecting superior quality, considering it's made in China. But come come on, really?!?!?!? It was fine at first. But as I used it and wore in,, after about 8 months, the flaws started to show. In the past I have gotten 5+ years out of a purse, if not longer. This isn't even two years.  First the actual item is noticeably smaller than what's shown in the images. Secondly, the shell is decent quality. But more importantly, the fabric used for the lining is cheap and thin. And it's not anchored to the interior of the shell. When I take my keys out of the small front pockets in the front near the bottom, the fabric often comes out with the keys.  A few weeks ago, the lining material jammed in the zipper. I had to cut into the shell with my Dremel tool and a cutting blade to get the lining free of the zipper. And the zipper in one corner of the compartment above it is separating from the shell. And the anti theft pocket in the back is only big enough for a smart phone.  Finally one of the clips that anchors the shoulder strap to the D ring on the shell pulled out from the other half of the mount that allows it to rotate.  Junk!
Love the material.  Great price.  Super nice bag, roomy, soft material, love the color.

When I purchased this purse I thought I was settling on something just because I needed more room and more pockets for my stuff to keep it organized. And my favorite part was that the overall balance of the weight from each compartment made it feel super easy and comfy to carry with "both" types of straps. Really love 💕💕💕💕 this purse,will definitely be buying more of them now that I know how well put together they are. 💕💕💕 Just buy one,you won't regret it. :) oh,and the clutch bag,also great hardware,not plastic. Honestly I would give this more than a 5 star. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

评论概述: The straps are ugly and weak
评论详情: The backpack itself is ok, it is pretty until you turn it over. The straps look like a bronze ribbon and they aren’t any strong. They are not strong enough to bear the weight if you fill the bag, and they are too long, even when set to the shortest possible place.

I wanted a more sturdy, small backpack to replace one I had for a while.  This bag exceeded all my expectations, especially for the price point.  It's very sturdy.  The "leather" is soft and flexible.  It has a lot of pockets and storage spaces.  The straps are comfortable, well made.  It holds far more than it looks like it should.  In the main compartment I can put my iPad, a Surface laptop, a sketch pad, markers, charge cables and still have room for other stuff, and that doesn't include the front pockets.The zippers are metal and well made.  They slide easily and don't catch.  I did remove the tassel on the front because I thought it was ugly. :)I love the little bag that comes with it.  I don't carry a purse.  I have a small wallet for my license and cards.  I can put that wallet, my phone and a small stash of Advil and carry it shopping or out and the bangle fits my wrist well.My ONLY complaint is that there needs to be a bit more fabric inside because the top of the backpack sinks inward when it has a lot in it because the fabric pulls it in.  This is extremely minor, and with as much as I stuffed into it for a two day trip, it was barely an inconvenience.Highly recommended!

I bought this to replace my lunch bag and purse that have become very daunting to carry up the steps to get to my job.  It has been a game changer. It is the perfect size to carry all my necessities and my lunch! There are numerous pockets with zippers for storage,  beautiful leather feel, and very sturdy straps. It is high quality so I'm sure I will get a lot of use out of it.
